document_data.name: Aunadar Bleth
document_data.mainbody: '''Aunadar Bleth''' was a [[human]] noble of the [[Bleth]] family of [[Cormyr]].
document_data.History:
Since he was sighted in the royal library with the crown princess [[Tanalasta Obarskyr]], it was rumored that they were sharing a romance.

In [[1369 DR]], Aunadar was on a hunt with King [[Azoun IV]], Baron [[Thomdor]], and Duke [[Bhereu]] when all three of his companions were poisoned by a magical [[abraxus]] during the [[abraxus affair]]. only to be revealed as a traitor and killed.
